text: Abukari Gariba (13 June 1939 - 23 January 2021) was a Ghanaian footballer. He was born in Yamale, Ghana. He competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics and the 1972 Summer Olympics. Gariba died at the age of 81 in Kumasi, Ghana on 23 January 2021. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Olympians for Ghana
title: Abukari Gariba
